title: Badboy Style 3-Disc Audio Set
description:
From the Website:

 



Enough chit-chat. Let's get down to it. In just a few minutes, you're going to learn...

    * How society and people's behavior makes up a The concept of "The Matrix," and how knowing about it will free you up to achieve things you previously thought were impossible (like walking up to a woman you"ve never met before and making out with her!)
    
* Simple -- sometimes even illogical -- strategies that will bump up your confidence like it was on steroids. No one knows why these offbeat techniques work, only that they do.
    
* Uncover which lies you've been lead to believe in when it comes to girls (Like "Girls don't like sex!"), and how you can use these lies to your advantage!
    
* A new way to create attraction. You'll learn lots of simple secrets that translate the laws of social dynamics into mind-bending, lust-filled attraction, no matter what you look like, or how far "out of your league" the girl you're going after is.
    
* How to be in control of every situation you're in. Even if you were in a bar full of Hell's Angels who wanted to beat the crap out of you, with these simple strategies, even "White Power Bill" would think twice about messing with you.
    
* How to tell when a girl is attracted to you so you know when to make your move. Seriously, once you learn this skill, you can kiss "crashing and burning" goodbye!
    
* How you can use my patented "Go First" Principle to knock-out any hesitation with women and get amazing responses from your desired target.
    
* The greatest rapport secret ever discovered and how you can use it to meet nine out of every ten women.
    
* Discover why it's important to learn the two most powerful types of rapport (what makes two people comfortable with each other). You'll be shocked at what they are. But if you understand the secret behind them, then you will have eliminated what's holding you back "cracked the girl code" and tapped into an atomic power for exploding attraction.
    *
 Which topics of conversation work best? Now you'll know what to talk to her about (no matter what) and how to smoothly transition from one topic of conversation to another without any awkward stuttering or pauses.
    
* How to turn your home into a stark-raving chick magnet that will cultivate the kind of playboy lifestyle you've always wanted.
    
* Key concepts to dating that will separate you from every other guy she's ever gone out with and ensure that you'll get more than just a "kiss goodnight" at the end of it!
    * How to annihilate your chances of being "stood up" or "flaked on" by girls. This strategy alone will give you a 35% to 100% pop in making sure that when a girl makes a date with you, she'll keep it!
    
* The single, most important secret of creating a lifestyle that makes picking-up women easy, and how just by knowing it, you'll have an edge over all the other "alpha males" out there.
    
* The "Unwritten Rules" of picking up women, and how violating these rules is the most common cause of failure.
    
* How to completely MURDER your bad beliefs and quickly re-train yourself to not only believe -- but KNOW -- that you can get any girl you want. Just this act of building up a new, positive belief system will make you glisten with power and achieve your goals left-and-right.
    
* Learn that what women say isn't always what they mean, and once you've learned to speak their "language," you'll have such a deep and profound understanding of women, you'll never be frustrated by them again.
    
* How to easily meet women without nervousness, or rejection. And the best part is, you don"t have to spend hours memorizing pre-scripted openers to do it!
    
* How to manipulate your energy levels to radiate a strong male energy that will not only make you irresistible to women, but also shut down any competition you have from men -- instantly.
    
* How to use the dance floor of any club to attract women to you likes flies to honey.
    
* The biggest mistakes guys make, and how you can increase your chances of success with women 300%-500% with another simple strategy (yet few guys would ever think to try this!)
    
* The best way to get phone numbers, and what to do after you've got them to ensure she sees you again!
    
* Key strategies to use when going out with a friend (or friends) that will turn them into your "A Team" for picking up chicks. No more worrying about "cock-blocking," your friends will actually HELP you get the girl you want! 

 

 
But it's not just lofty theory you're getting here. I actually TELL you how to use these secrets and apply them in the REAL WORLD. Unlike other ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œexpertsÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ who just leave you with the teachings and hope you figure it out for yourself, I actually give you easy-to-follow missions that will dramatically improve your skills. Step-by-step. There is no guess work on your part. You will actually see your success unfold before your very eyes!


Here's a breakdown:

* Mission 1: It"s hard to talk to people you've never met before (especially pretty girls!). So this mission is designed to help you become comfortable and confident at meeting whoever you want - men or women. It doesn't matter. After you're done with this exercise, you'll be a true social butterfly.

* Mission 2: Every girl worth approaching is usually in a ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œpackÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ (or group of women/men). Usually, guys wait until the woman is alone to approach her. This is WRONG! The best time to approach is when she's in a group. I'll show you exactly how to approach a group of people and get the girl you want in this exercise.

* Mission 3: Choosing your target is extremely important. You have to know what your goal is and how to handle her friends. This is VERY IMPORTANT! In this exercise, I'll show you how to single out your target woman, and get her away from the group she"s with for some quality alone time.

* Mission 4: The first and most important step when seducing any woman is creating a strong emotional connection. This is where most guys mess up. If you ever wondered why a girl never ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œcalled you back,ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ it's because she did not have a strong emotional connection with you. In this exercise, I"ll show you how to create one with any woman, no matter where you are.

* Mission 5: It's an inevitable fact that eventually, you"re going to have to deal with competition from other men. Almost NO ONE teaches you how to deal with guys trying to steal your girl away. That's why I created this mission to show you how it's not only easy to deal with other guys, but it can be safe and rewarding too.

* Mission 6: The real ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œtrickÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ in the art of seduction is getting people to FEEL exactly what you want them to. Imagine having the power to make a woman feel lust, burning desire, longing, or even love (all for you!). In this exercise, you will master the art of changing people's emotions so that they feel only what YOU want them to!

* Mission 7: I've saved the best mission for last. If you've ever wondered how you can get a girl all to yourself and start making out with her, stop wondering! In mission 7, I reveal every single little detail on how to do exactly that! No more guess work when it comes to figuring out if she's ready to be kissed.

And that's just for starters. You won't know the true depth of the forbidden knowledge you'll gain until you experience it for yourself.


Please SEED, Thank You......
